communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. All emails and exchanges, meeting notes and/or documentation regarding the proposed polling station at Sunol Glen Unified School District for the special recall election for school board members Linda Hurley and Ryan Jergensen for the dates 3/1/24 through 4/16/24.

2. All phone records regarding the proposed polling station at Sunol Glen Unified School District for the special recall election for school board members Linda Hurley and Ryan Jergensen for the dates 3/1/24 through 4/16/24.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment or document upload if available (or CD-ROM if not).

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

NB Burke

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. All emails and exchanges, meeting notes and/or documentation regarding the Sunol Glen Unified School District special recall election for school board members Linda Hurley and Ryan Jergensen for the dates 3/1/24 through 4/16/24.

2. All phone records regarding the Sunol Glen Unified School District special recall election for school board members Linda Hurley and Ryan Jergensen for the dates 3/1/24 through 4/16/24.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment or document upload if available (or CD-ROM if not).

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

NB Burke
